availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, attorney. North Carolina native. Married to Laura S. Hauser. Attorney in Louisville in 1853. Delegate to a Whig Party nominating convention in Louisville in 1853.

ab.bibl: Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 5, p. 247. Find A Grave, "William Alexander Hauser (1817-1908)," Memorial #92574405, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GSln=HAU&GSpartial=1&GSbyrel=all&GSst=19&GScntry=4&GSsr=321&GRid=92574405& (accessed June, 29, 2017). The Louisville Daily Courier, July 18, 1853.
